en.title: Vocational Training in Graphic Design
en.subtitle: Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona
en.content: I studied graphic design at the Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona. I learned the basics of design and how to use design software.

en.title: Internship at Creative Agency
en.subtitle: Creative Minds Agency
en.content: Completed a year-long internship at Creative Minds Agency, where I worked on various design projects and gained practical experience in the industry.

en.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
en.subtitle: Self-Employed
en.content: Worked as a freelance graphic designer, collaborating with clients from various industries to create logos, branding materials, and marketing collateral.

en.title: Senior Graphic Designer
en.subtitle: Design Studio XYZ
en.content: Currently working as a senior graphic designer at Design Studio XYZ, leading a team of designers and overseeing the creation of high-quality design projects.

en.title: Guest Lecturer
en.subtitle: University of Design
en.content: Served as a guest lecturer at the University of Design, teaching courses on graphic design principles and sharing industry insights with students.

en.title: Creative Director
en.subtitle: Innovative Design Solutions
en.content: Currently working as a creative director at Innovative Design Solutions, leading creative projects and driving the company's design vision forward.

es.title: Formación Profesional en Diseño Gráfico
es.subtitle: Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona
es.content: Estudié diseño gráfico en el Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona. Aprendí los conceptos básicos del diseño y cómo utilizar software de diseño.

ca.title: Formació Professional en Disseny Gràfic
ca.subtitle: Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona
ca.content: Vaig estudiar disseny gràfic a l'Institut Escola del Treball de Barcelona. Vaig aprendre els conceptes bàsics del disseny i com utilitzar programari de disseny.
